title: Article 2 - Municipal Police Training Program
content:
Article 2 - Municipal Police Training Program

State Regulations

Part 6018 - Basic Course For Correction Officers (§ 6018.1 to 6018.9)

Part 6019 - Pre-employment Correction Training (§ 6019.1 to 6019.9)

Part 6020 - Basic Course For Police Officers (§ 6020.1 to 6020.9)

Part 6021 - Course In Police Supervision (§ 6021.1 to 6021.9)

Part 6022 - Police In-service Training Courses (§ 6022.1 to 6022.7)

Part 6023 - Instructor Standards And Qualifications (§ 6023.1 to 6023.8)

Part 6024 - Firearms Instructor Standards And Qualifications (§ 6024.1 to 6024.9)

Part 6025 - Basic Course For Peace Officers (§ 6025.1 to 6025.9)

Part 6026 - Pre-employment Police Training (§ 6026.1 to 6026.9)

Part 6027 - Security Guard Training Courses (§ 6027.1 to 6027.14)

Part 6028 - Approved Security Guard Training Schools (§ 6028.1 to 6028.8)

Part 6029 - Security Guard Instructor Standards And Qualifications (§ 6029.1 to 6029.9)

Part 6030 - Soft-body Ballistic Armor Vests For Police Officers (§ 6030.1 to 6030.10)

Part 6031 - Repealed

Part 6035 - Procedures For Accreditation Of Law Enforcement Agencies (§ 6035.1 to 6035.9)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
